mapper.select: SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.title title, m.level level, m.sort sort, m.name name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM ums_user_role_relation arr LEFT JOIN ums_role r ON arr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_menu_relation rmr ON r.id = rmr.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE arr.user_id = #{userId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.id
